page.title: 20Transport,Earlston
page.content: The local children usually walk to school but children from the countryside travel by bus.Some mothers bring their children in by car.The car is the main form of transport. Most families have a car.There are regular daily bus services to local towns. A local coach company provide buses for private hire.Some people,who work in the village,cycle to work or use their motorbike.The farmers have tractors to transport their goods. Heavy goods are transported by lorry. The fuels for the various forms of transport are diesel and petrol.
